---
title: "Follow-Up & Issue Management"
---

## Issue Identification
Issues may include:
- Protocol deviations
- Data discrepancies
- Missing documentation
- Training gaps

---

## Issue Documentation
Each issue should include:
- Description
- Reference (protocol / GCP)
- Required action
- Due date
- Responsible party

---

## Follow-Up Letters
**Purpose**
- Summarize visit findings
- Clearly document expectations
- Establish accountability

**CRA Best Practices**
- Be factual and objective
- Reference protocol sections
- Track closure formally

---

## Escalation
Escalate issues when:
- Repeated noncompliance occurs
- Subject safety is at risk
- Site responsiveness is inadequate
